prompt: /imagine  Spicy Lentil Tacos for One – Close-up of two small corn tortillas filled with seasoned green lentils, topped with vibrant diced tomatoes, creamy avocado slices, and fresh cilantro, drizzled with lime juice. The tortillas are warm and pliable, showcasing the rich textures of the lentils and toppings, with natural lighting casting soft shadows over the dish, warm tones enhancing the vibrant colors. Taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Lemon Herb Quinoa Bowl – a vibrant dish featuring fluffy, nutty quinoa, bright red halved cherry tomatoes, diced green cucumber and yellow bell pepper, topped with chopped fresh parsley. The quinoa is dressed with a golden olive oil and lemon juice drizzle, creating a fresh and colorful presentation. Styled in a close-up shot with natural lighting, soft shadows, and warm tones, highlighting the textures of the vegetables. Taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Lentil Curry for One – Cozy Comfort in Every Bite, featuring tender green or brown lentils, creamy white coconut milk, sautéed golden onions, and flecks of vibrant spices like curry powder and turmeric. The dish is garnished with bright green fresh cilantro. The lentils are simmered to a rich, thick consistency, creating a comforting texture. The curry is served warm in a bowl with a soft, rustic appearance and minimal props. The style is a close-up shot with natural lighting, soft shadows, and warm tones. taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  BBQ Chicken Sandwich for One – Smoky and Tangy Bliss in Every Bite, featuring a glazed boneless, skinless chicken breast brushed with rich BBQ sauce, nestled in a freshly toasted golden hamburger bun, topped with crispy pickles and vibrant sliced red onion. The sandwich is garnished with a sprinkle of smoked paprika and garlic powder, set against a natural wood background with soft shadows and warm tones. Close-up shot, taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Mediterranean Couscous Salad for One, featuring tender couscous, diced cucumber, halved cherry tomatoes, finely chopped red onion, sliced Kalamata olives, and crumbled feta cheese, all tossed in a tangy lemon dressing. The salad is vibrant with a fresh parsley garnish, drizzled with olive oil and red wine vinegar. Presented in a top-down view, capturing the textures and colors of the ingredients, with natural lighting, soft shadows, and warm tones, highlighting the freshness of each component. Taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Cheesy Quinoa Bowl for One – A cozy single-serving meal featuring fluffy cooked quinoa, vibrant steamed broccoli florets, halved cherry tomatoes, and a generous layer of melted cheddar cheese, all drizzled with olive oil and seasoned with garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Garnished with fresh basil leaves for a touch of color. The dish is baked until the cheese is bubbly and golden brown. Captured with natural lighting and soft shadows in a close-up style, highlighting the creamy textures and vibrant colors. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Spicy Chicken Tacos for One featuring juicy diced chicken breast seasoned with taco spice, served on warm corn tortillas, topped with vibrant fresh salsa, a dollop of creamy sour cream, slices of ripe avocado, and garnished with fresh cilantro, accompanied by a lime wedge. Close-up shot with natural lighting, soft shadows, and warm tones. taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Avocado Toast with Egg – close-up of a single slice of rustic whole grain bread topped with creamy mashed avocado, a perfectly fried sunny-side-up egg with a golden yolk, drizzled with olive oil, seasoned with salt and black pepper, garnished with red pepper flakes and fresh cilantro. Soft shadows and warm tones, natural lighting. taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Mediterranean Pasta Salad for One, featuring cooked fusilli pasta tossed with vibrant halved cherry tomatoes, diced cucumber, crumbled feta cheese, and sliced Kalamata olives, all dressed in a zesty lemon-oregano dressing, garnished with fresh parsley, in a colorful presentation. Close-up shot with natural lighting, soft shadows, warm tones, minimal background. taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl for One – A vibrant mix of fluffy quinoa, halved cherry tomatoes, diced cucumber, diced bell pepper, sliced avocado, and crumbled feta cheese, all drizzled with olive oil, lemon juice, and balsamic vinegar. The dish is garnished with fresh parsley. Styled as a close-up with natural lighting, soft shadows, and warm tones, featuring a rustic bowl to emphasize the fresh ingredients. taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Garlic Roasted Brussels Sprouts for One, featuring halved Brussels sprouts with a golden-brown, crispy exterior, drizzled with a glossy sheen of olive oil and speckled with minced garlic, salt, and black pepper. The dish is served warm, with optional balsamic vinegar lightly drizzled over the top for added flavor. Close-up shot with natural lighting, soft shadows, and warm tones, minimal background. taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Savory Spinach and Feta Puff Pastry – Flaky Delight in 25 Minutes, featuring a golden-brown, flaky puff pastry pocket. The pastry is stuffed with a vibrant green filling of roughly chopped fresh spinach, crumbled white feta cheese, and dollops of creamy cream cheese, with flecks of minced garlic adding texture. The top is brushed with a shiny egg wash for a glossy finish. Captured from a top-down perspective with natural lighting, soft shadows, and warm tones, set against a minimal background. taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Caprese Skewers for One - a close-up shot featuring five halved cherry tomatoes, three small fresh mozzarella balls (bocconcini), and five fresh basil leaves threaded onto a wooden skewer. The skewers are arranged on a simple white plate, drizzled with balsamic reduction and olive oil, topped with a sprinkle of sea salt and black pepper. Natural lighting highlights the vibrant colors of the tomatoes and basil, creating a warm, inviting atmosphere. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken for One – a juicy boneless skinless chicken breast with prominent grill marks, glistening with a light golden-brown hue; a drizzle of zesty lemon juice from half a lemon, and flecks of minced garlic scattered on top. Garnished with fresh green parsley, the plate presents a vibrant contrast against the chicken. The dish is beautifully presented with soft natural lighting highlighting its textures, showing off the tender, succulent meat. Close-up view for detail and realism. taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Teriyaki Tofu Steak – A beautifully plated slice of golden-brown, caramelized firm tofu steak, coated in a glossy homemade teriyaki glaze. The dish is garnished with specks of white sesame seeds and vibrant green onion slices. The tofu is set against a backdrop of perfectly steamed jasmine rice, with sautéed colorful vegetables on the side. The lighting is natural with soft shadows and warm tones, conveying a comforting and enticing look. Close-up focus on the tofu steak, showcasing the textures and flavors. taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Chocolate Lava Mug Cake for One, featuring a warm, rich chocolate cake with a gooey molten center. The top is slightly cracked, revealing the oozing chocolate lava, with a sprinkle of powdered sugar for a touch of sweetness. Served in a rustic mug, the cake is dark brown with a glossy finish, and there are a few melting chocolate chips visible. Natural lighting highlights the moist texture and soft shadows enhance the warm tones of the chocolate. Close-up shot to showcase the dessert’s tempting details, taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q

/imagine  Teriyaki Chicken Bowl for One – a vibrant dish showcasing a juicy boneless, skinless chicken thigh glazed with a shiny homemade teriyaki sauce, served over fluffy white rice, accented with crisp stir-fry vegetables like bell peppers and broccoli, topped with chopped green onions and a sprinkle of sesame seeds for texture. The chicken is caramelized with a rich brown hue, and the colors of the vegetables pop against the white rice. The bowl is assembled with a warm, inviting aesthetic, captured in natural light with soft shadows, emphasizing the dish's appealing textures. taken with a food blogger's iPhone 16 Pro. --ar 3:2 --style raw --v 7 --profile rpavc3q
